Class NewExpenseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views.NewExpenseActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewInterface

    public class NewExpenseActivity
extends Activity
implements ViewInterface
    This is the activity that provides functionality for adding a new expense to the current claim.
